tool_description:
Give us a Street name! Our artificial intelligence will search for information and writes a paragraph according to your options.  StreetNarrator API provides a unique history/touristic AI text for any street around the world.
The Stories behind Streets API & From a Street name to the behind story
name: StreetNarrator
title: StreetNarrator
